frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-mailnag
frozen.shortDescription: Mail indicator (GMail, IMAP, POP) for GNOME.
frozen.longDescription:
Mail indicator (GMail, IMAP, POP) for GNOME.

Please note that this extension requires the mailnag daemon.
Install it from your distros package repositories or get it here:
https://github.com/pulb/mailnag

Please also note that this version of the extension does not support avatars (as shown in the screenshot).
If you like to have avatar support install this extension from your distros package repositories or get a package from here:
https://github.com/pulb/mailnag-gnome-shell

IMPORTANT:
I do not get notifications for user comments. Please always report bugs here:
https://github.com/pulb/mailnag-gnome-shell/issues
